results.title: Cytogenetic effects of antidiabetic drug metformin.
results.text_hl: In this study, the genotoxic potential of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ was evaluated by using @<m>DISEASE_Chromosome_Aberrations</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002869 @@@chromosome aberrations@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Chromosome_Aberrations</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002869 @@@CAs@@@), sister chromatid exchanges (SCEs), and micronucleus (MN) assays in @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ peripheral lymphocytes as well as comet assay in isolated lymphocytes.

citations.NLM: Yuzbasioglu D, Mahmoud JH, Mamur S, Unal F. Cytogenetic effects of antidiabetic drug metformin. Drug Chem Toxicol. 2022 Mar;45(2):955-962. PMID: 33161761
citations.BibTeX: @article{33161761, title={Cytogenetic effects of antidiabetic drug metformin.}, author={Yuzbasioglu D and Mahmoud JH and Mamur S and Unal F}, journal={Drug Chem Toxicol}, volume={45}, number={2}, pages={955-962}}

results.title: Addressing Metabolic Comorbidity in Individuals With Intellectual and Developmental Disability on Antipsychotics: A Clinical Case Series.
results.text_hl: Further research and randomized controlled trials are needed to examine the efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in this population.

citations.NLM: Stogios N, Hahn MK, Lunsky Y, Desarkar P, Agarwal SM. Addressing Metabolic Comorbidity in Individuals With Intellectual and Developmental Disability on Antipsychotics: A Clinical Case Series. J Clin Psychopharmacol. 2023 Jan-Feb 01;43(1):60-63. PMID: 36394921
